\[Prove\ that\ Fib\left(n\right)\ is\ the\ closest\ integer\ to\ \frac{{\varphi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}\ where\ \varphi =\frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2}\] 
Hint: Let  $\psi =\frac{(1-\sqrt{5})}{2}$ and then prove that $Fib\left(n\right)=\ \frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\noindent 


\item  Case where n = 0

\begin{enumerate}
\item  $0=Fib\left(0\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^0-{\psi }^0}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Expands\ to\ :\ \frac{1-1}{\sqrt{5}}\ $

\item  $\ \frac{0}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  0

\item  QED: 0 = Fib(0) = $\frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$
\end{enumerate}


\noindent 


\item  Case where n = 1 

\begin{enumerate}
\item  $1=Fib\left(1\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^1-{\psi }^1}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Expands\ to\ :\ \frac{{(\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2})}^1-{(\frac{1-\sqrt{5}}{2})}^1}{\sqrt{5}}\ $

\item  $\ \frac{\frac{1+\sqrt{5}-1+\sqrt{5}}{2}}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $\frac{\frac{2\sqrt{5}}{2}}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $\frac{\sqrt{5}}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  1

\item  QED: 1 = Fib\eqref{GrindEQ__1_} = $\frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$
\end{enumerate}

\item  n+1 case

\begin{enumerate}
\item  Define: $Fib\left(n\right)=\ \frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  Define: $Fib\left(n+1\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^{n+1}-{\psi }^{n+1}}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  Define: $Fib\left(n+1\right)=\frac{\varphi *{\varphi }^n-{\psi *\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  Define: $1+\ \varphi =1+\frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2}$

\begin{enumerate}
\item  $1+\ \varphi =\frac{3+\sqrt{5}}{2}={\varphi }^2$
\end{enumerate}

\item  Define: $1+\ \psi =1+\frac{(1-\sqrt{5})}{2}$

\begin{enumerate}
\item  $1+\ \psi =\frac{3-\sqrt{5}}{2}={\psi }^2$
\end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}


\noindent 


\item  Therefore: $Fib\left(n+2\right)=Fib\left(n\right)+Fib\left(n+1\right)$

\begin{enumerate}
\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{\varphi *{\varphi }^n-{\psi *\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}+\frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{\varphi *{\varphi }^n-{\psi *\psi }^n+{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{\varphi *{\varphi }^n+{\varphi }^n-{\psi *\psi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n(1+\varphi )-{\psi }^n(1+\psi )}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n(1+\varphi )-{\psi }^n(1+\psi )}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n*{\varphi }^2-{\psi }^n{*\psi }^2}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n+2\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^{n+2}-{\psi }^{n+2}}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  QED 
\end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}

\item  Now to prove our first question:

\begin{enumerate}
\item   $\psi =\frac{(1-\sqrt{5})}{2}$

\item  $\left|\psi \right|<1$

\item  ${\mathop{\mathrm{lim}}_{n\to \infty } {\psi }^n\ }=0$

\item  $Fib\left(n\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n-{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}-\frac{{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n\right)=\frac{{\varphi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}-\frac{{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $Fib\left(n\right)+\frac{{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}=\frac{{\varphi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$

\item  $\left|\frac{{\psi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}\right|<1\ \forall \ n>0$

\item  $QED$ Ergo, $\frac{{\varphi }^n}{\sqrt{5}}$ gives the closest integer approximation to Fib(n)
\end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}

\noindent
